name: mern_messenger
description: "MERN messenger is a real-time chat application built using the MERN stack, which stands for MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. It allows users to communicate with each other in real-time through chat messages. The app uses Socket.io for real-time communication and MongoDB for storing chat messages. The frontend is built using React and the backend API is built using Express and Node.js. The MERN messenger is a great example of a real-time web application and can be used as a starting point for building more complex chat applications."

scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"

author: sraharv_creations
